settings.newsletter_subheading: Join us on the journey towards better health, one shot at a time.

settings.title: Why choose Vive Organic?
settings.text: Wellness Boosts are crafted by a team of holistic Doctors from the finest ingredients nature has to offer. The result? Harmonious formulas that you can feel working at first sip. Start Your Wellness Journey with the Vive Tribe!

settings.title: The Vive Promise
settings.text: Our shots are never artificial. Never heated. Just the way nature intended. Meet the people behind Vive Organic and discover their journey towards better health for all.

settings.title: What is a FUNCTIONAL SHOT?
settings.text: For decades, we’ve depended on capsules, powders and droppers to obtain the concentrated ingredients that we know to be beneficial, like Echinacea, Turmeric and Ginger. Such methods require ingredients to be processed, dried or stored for long periods of time, stripping them of much nutritional value. Functional Shots deliver ingredients in the closest possible form to the living plants they originated from. By Cold-Pressing ingredients, we deliver the freshest and most pure forms of natural wellness in one delicious single serving.

Vive Organic is dedicated to providing the highest quality, which extends far beyond our USDA Organic and Kosher Certifications. We’ve assessed hundreds of farms around the world, and exclusively source our ingredients from the top tier of organic farms. We never use artificial colors or any type of sweeteners – not even stevia, honey or sugar. We believe that nature alone should determine the color and flavor of our Wellness Shots.

settings.title: Unwavering Commitment to Quality
settings.text: Vive Organic is dedicated to providing the highest quality, which extends far beyond our USDA Organic and Kosher Certifications. We’ve assessed hundreds of farms around the world, and exclusively source our ingredients from the top tier of organic farms. We never use artificial colors or any type of sweeteners – not even stevia, honey or sugar. We believe that nature alone should determine the color and flavor of our Functional Shots.

settings.title: Start Your Wellness Journey with the Vive Tribe!

settings.paragraph_text: Vive Organic is the strongest wellness from earth. Fresh ingredients like organic ginger, turmeric root and echinacea* are cold-pressed in a concentrated shot to keep your body battle ready. No fillers. No messing around.
